features: Get NVMe solid state performance with up to 1050MB/s read and 1000MB/s write speeds in a portable, high-capacity drive(1) (Based on internal testing; performance may be lower depending on host device & other factors. 1MB=1,000,000 bytes.)

Up to 3-meter drop protection and IP65 water and dust resistance mean this tough drive can take a beating(3) (Previously rated for 2-meter drop protection and IP55 rating. Now qualified for the higher, stated specs.)
Use the handy carabiner loop to secure it to your belt loop or backpack for extra peace of mind.

body.description: Your life’s an adventure. To capture and keep its best moments, you need fast, high-capacity storage that accelerates every move. 1050MB/s read and 1000MB/s write speeds let you store your content and creations on a fast drive that fits seamlessly into your active lifestyle. Up to two-meter drop protection (3), with IP55 water and dust resistance (3), a Carabiner loop for securing the drive. From the brand trusted by professional photographers, the SanDisk Extreme Portable SSD provides fast solid state performance in a tough, reliable storage solution. 1GB = 1,000,000,000 bytes, 1TB = 1,000,000,000,000 bytes. Actual user capacity less. Up to 1050MB/s read speed, up to 1000MB/s write speed. Engineered with proprietary technology to reach speeds beyond UHS-I 104MB/s, requires compatible devices capable of reaching such speed. Based on internal testing; Performance may be lower depending on host device, interface, usage conditions and other factors. 1MB=1,000,000 bytes. (1) See official SanDisk website. (2) Password protection uses 256-bit AES encryption and is supported by Windows 8, Windows 10 and macOS v10.9+ (Software download required for Mac, see official SanDisk website.) (3) Based on internal testing. IPEC 60529 IP 55: Tested to withstand water flow (30 kPa) at 3 min; Limited dust contact does not interfere with the operation. Must be clean and dry before use.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Powerful yet Portable Get fast NVMe solid state performance with up to 1050MB/s read and 1000MB/s write speeds(1) in a portable, high-capacity drive that’s perfect for creating amazing content or capturing incredible footage.

Tough Enough to Take with You Up to three-meter drop protection and IP65 water and dust resistance(4) mean this durable drive can take a beating. It Goes Where You Go Use the handy carabiner loop to attach the drive to your belt loop or backpack for extra security when you’re out in the world.

Put a Lock on Your Files Help keep private content private with the included password protection featuring 256‐bit AES hardware encryption.(3) SanDisk Memory Zone App for File Management(5) Available from the Google Play store, the SanDisk Memory Zone app(5) lets you unlock, access and back up your phone's files in one location. It can also automatically move files from your device to your SSD to free up space.

Complete Your Gear Bag Extreme Portable SSD Extreme PRO Portable SSD Extreme PRO SD UHS-I Card Read Speeds(1) Up to 1050MB/s Read Speeds(1) Up to 2000MB/s read Read Speeds(1) Up to 200MB/s(64GB-1TB) Write Speeds(1) Up to 1000MB/s Write Speeds(1) Up to 2000MB/s Write Speeds(1) Up to 140MB/s(256GB-1TB) Durability Up to three-meter drop protection and IP65 water and dust resistance(4) Durability Up to three-meter drop protection and IP65 water and dust resistance(4) Durability Temperature-proof, waterproof, shockproof, and X-ray proof(7) Security Included password protection featuring 256‐bit AES hardware encryption.(3) Security Included password protection featuring 256‐bit AES hardware encryption.(3) Security Includes a 2-year offer for RescuePRO Deluxe file recovery software(8) File Management Easily manage files and free up space with the SanDisk Memory Zone app.(5) File Management Easily manage files and free up space with the SanDisk Memory Zone app.(5) Video Quality 4K UHD video(9)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Speed, Capacity, and Reliability – SanDisk Delivers
reviews.reviewText: I recently acquired the SanDisk 2TB Extreme Portable SSD, and I'm thoroughly impressed with its performance and features.First and foremost, the speed of data transfer is exceptional. Whether I'm transferring large files, editing videos, or running applications directly from the drive, the SSD handles everything with remarkable speed and efficiency. It has significantly reduced waiting times, enhancing my overall productivity.The 2TB storage capacity is a game-changer for those dealing with large media files or extensive data libraries. It provides ample space without compromising on portability. The compact and rugged design ensures durability, making it an ideal companion for on-the-go professionals or anyone who values data security.The inclusion of USB-C and USB-A cables adds versatility, allowing seamless connectivity with various devices. The compatibility with both Mac and Windows systems is a definite plus.What sets the SanDisk Extreme Portable SSD apart is its durability. The robust build and IP55 water and dust resistance make it suitable for various environments, providing peace of mind during outdoor or travel use.The drive's encryption capabilities contribute to data security, and the added bonus of a 3-year limited warranty reflects SanDisk's confidence in the product's reliability.While the price might be slightly higher than some competitors, the SanDisk 2TB Extreme Portable SSD is a worthwhile investment for those who prioritize speed, capacity, and durability. It has become an indispensable tool for my digital lifestyle, earning it a well-deserved five-star rating.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Videographer's Go-to for Large File Storage
reviews.reviewText: As a wedding videographer, finding reliable and high-capacity storage solutions is crucial for my work, and the SanDisk 2TB Extreme Portable SSD has proven to be my go-to choice. This portable SSD not only offers an impressive 2TB of storage space but also delivers blazing-fast transfer speeds, ensuring that I can efficiently backup and transfer large video files without any lag or delay. The solid-state technology of this drive provides exceptional durability, which is vital for withstanding the demands of my on-the-go lifestyle. Moreover, the compact and rugged design makes it easy to carry around and provides peace of mind knowing that my valuable footage is well-protected. The compatibility with both Mac and PC systems is another plus. Overall, the SanDisk 2TB Extreme Portable SSD has truly exceeded my expectations and has become an indispensable tool in my wedding videography arsenal.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars How small it is and sturdy. Can carry it in anything, very small but powerful.
reviews.reviewText: I had a problem with the first shipment, but once I had it in my possession, it was super fast on downloads, has a huge 2T hard drive, and is small enough to carry and hide in a small space. It is so small compared to the size of my old ones, which were the size of a modem today. That was for storage, but this is 4x as large with 2T and is the size of a credit card, but a little thicker. And the company makes superior products.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars GREAT portable drive
reviews.reviewText: This is one of the nicest portable drives I've used. It's a little pricey, but has the speed and (hopefully) durability to make it worthwhile. It feels like the build-quality is solid. I like the hook option. Also the matte finish on one side so it doesn't slide off a table easily. Great design. And looks high-end when working at the client's office.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: A pocket-sized storage solution that packs a 2 terabyte punch. With this device, you can store all your important files, including your music library, movie collection, and even cat videos. Say goodbye to storage anxiety and hello to convenience.However, it is not only about collecting pictures of your dog wearing hats. This device is incredibly fast, transferring files quickly and efficiently. It can easily handle editing large videos and importing your Steam library. Lag is non-existent with this device.SanDisk designed this drive to be durable and withstand water, dust, and accidental drops. SanDisk designed this drive to be durable and withstand water, dust, and accidental drops. In summary, it is a reliable option. For mini, mighty, and portable storage, consider the SanDisk 2TB Extreme Portable SSD. It's like having a magic portal to your entire digital world, tucked away in your pocket.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Does not work with Iphone
reviews.reviewText: It has a big storage capacity, and works great... except with the iphone which we bought it for. We've had to daisy chain wires, computers, and such together to get it to work the way we need.

reviews.reviewTitle: Excelente, muito rápido e prático de usar
reviews.reviewText: O ssd é bem portátil e passa arquivos muito rapido. o adaptador de usb-c para usb A ajuda muito em computadores mais antigos, porém diminui a velocidade um pouco, mesmo assim continua muito rápido. podem comprar tranquilamente.

El tamaño es ideal se puede trasnportar facilmente y la velocidad de trasnferencia es bastante buena, migre la información de mi disco externo anterior a este nuevo y fue bastante rapido. hasta ahora de la mejor marca que he conseguido memoria USB y discos externos para almacenamiento.

reviews.reviewTitle: Sleek, Fast and Easy To Carry.....What more do you want?
reviews.reviewText: As a tech enthusiast, I recently experimented with the SanDisk 500GB Extreme Portable SSD and it has thoroughly impressed me. The most striking aspect is its speed - the read and write speeds are significantly faster than traditional hard drives, making it ideal for tasks like video editing, handling large images, or swift data transfers. Its portability is another huge plus. The SSD is compact and lightweight, perfect for those on the go, and its robust build with shock resistance adds to its appeal, ensuring data safety even in rough conditions.Compatibility-wise, this SSD has worked flawlessly across various devices and operating systems, including both Windows and Mac, which is crucial for someone who regularly switches between different platforms. Security is well-addressed too, with the inclusion of password protection backed by 256-bit AES hardware encryption, offering peace of mind for sensitive data.The design of the SSD is sleek and modern, and it includes practical elements like a carabiner loop for secure attachment. The 500GB capacity hits a sweet spot, providing ample storage for most tasks without the need for unnecessary extra space. Finally, considering its array of features and overall performance, the SSD stands out as a good value for money, making it a solid choice for professionals or anyone in need of reliable, fast external storage. Overall, the SanDisk 500GB Extreme Portable SSD is a top-tier option for tech aficionados seeking a balance of speed, durability, portability, and security in their external storage devices.

Este producto es una brutalidad en velocidad, hasta ahora ha sido muy confiable.La velocidad de transferencia de videos de una tarjeta GoPro al SSD es altamente veloz.Es pequeño y no estorba.Lo mejor en SSDs externos.
